page.title: 17Industry and Employment
page.content: Many people live in Anston but work in Sheffield. Housing here is less expensive. The city is easily reached by the{A57}and the{M1 motorway.}There are steelworkers, engineers, office workers and shop assistants who work in{Sheffield}and miners who work at {Dinnington Colliery.}Local industry provides employment for people living in the area. There is a small industrial estate, the{Todwick Road {Industrial Estate,}containing small firms including a stove enamellers, a catering equipment manufacturer and a steel stock holder and engineering firm.{North Anston Industrial Estate, on Houghton Road, is larger and contains steel stock holders, metal fabricators, a petroleum distributor and road transport firms. On Main Street there is a firm that makes circular, band and chain saws.
